refnamediv.refpurpose: Run mysqlcheck on the database of the specified Koha instance.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Run mysqlcheck on the database of the specified Koha instance.
Any arguments provided before the name of the instance are passed directly to mysqlcheck. This means that all the operations of mysqlcheck are available through this script.
